about: Kasia is from the city of Mysłowice in Silesia

education.title: Master of Arts in Scientific Information and Library Science
Bachelor of Arts in Scientific Information and Library Science

Tea: Choosing the right tea based on mood
Knowledge of less common tea types
I know some fun facts about tea, like where lapsang tea comes from
Guitar: Songs I can play: Simple Man (Lynyrd Skynyrd), Knockin' On Heaven's Door
Astronomy: Can identify the Big Dipper and Cassiopeia in the night sky
I know there's a large nebula near Orion
I know that Europa is a moon of Jupiter
I know there's water on Europa
I can tell the difference between a star and a planet at night
Literature: Experimenting with writing novels and poetry
Technology: Once replaced a CPU radiator myself
Cooking: I love and know how to cook
I keep and feed my own sourdough starter
Gardening: I've grown tomatoes, cucumbers, raspberries, strawberries, thyme, sage, rosemary, mint, avocado, onion
I have my own small garden
I can grow plants from seed
Art: Creative writing – created and maintained my own blog
Music: Know music theory and how to read neumes
Know vocal ranges and how to identify them
Travel: I enjoy meeting people and talking to strangers
Cinema: Know how to shoot a film
Finance: I can save money toward specific goals (e.g. new laptop)
I manage my personal budget in a structured way
Other: Have a driving license and can drive a car
